::: {.column-margin}
**Date:** 11 August 2025    
**Time:** 13:00-14:00 BST / 14:00-15:00 UTC    
**Venue:** Online via Zoom
:::

We will discuss the [Oxford iHealth Champions programme](https://oxford-ihtm.io/champions/), what the *programme is about*, the *Champion's journey* and its requirements, and the *accreditation/badging process* for milestones and achievements.

This event is open to all Oxford IHTM alumni. [Registration](https://forms.gle/vWy1qMbjALSHAswY7){.external target="_blank"} is **required** to be able to attend.

This session is planned at a reasonable time for those **who are at or within the West Africa and East Africa time zones** but can be participated in by an alumnus from any time zone or location if the timing is more convenient for them.

The session Zoom link will be provided via email after your registration has been verified.
